npcs.name: Duvessa Shane
npcs.motivation: Protect the town from external threats
npcs.secret: Knows of Arcane Brotherhood activity but fears retaliation

events.description: A chardalyn shard is found in the market, sparking panic.
events.consequences: Merchants raise prices; cultists spread Auril propaganda.
events.roleplay_prompt: A merchant begs the party to remove the shard before it corrupts anyone.

hooks.description: Exposing Naerth’s secret causes Targos to boycott Bryn Shander’s trade.
hooks.trigger: Players reveal Naerth’s Arcane Brotherhood ties
hooks.consequences: Trade disputes escalate; new quest to resolve tensions.
